rows.label: qst201702_0010
rows.name: Seriously? Is that all you've got?

rows.label: qst201702_0020
rows.name:
I thought army was meant to be the pride of Superbia?
Looks like you need to go through basic training again!

rows.label: qst201702_0030
rows.name:
You're definitely a strong fighter.
I'll give you that.

rows.label: qst201702_0040
rows.name:
I daresay even the whole garrison would
have trouble putting you down.

rows.label: qst201702_0050
rows.name: However.

rows.label: qst201702_0060
rows.name:
The brave Imperial Army corps represent
but a fraction of the might of Superbia.

rows.label: qst201702_0070
rows.name:
The real reason that our enemies tremble before us
is our legions of Divine Beast weapons.

rows.label: qst201702_0080
rows.name: And the skill of those who operate them!

rows.label: qst201702_0090
rows.name:
Oho!
So the Divine Beast weapons make Superbia's army, eh?

rows.label: qst201702_0100
rows.name:
Absolutely. I believe even someone like you would
struggle against one.

rows.label: qst201702_0110
rows.name: Hah, is that right? Well then.

rows.label: qst201702_0120
rows.name: If the captain says so, then, uh, I guess it must be true.

rows.label: qst201702_0130
rows.name: So! How about we go and...test your theory?

rows.label: qst201702_0140
rows.name: Test?

rows.label: qst201702_0150
rows.name: A full-on demonstration of skill!

rows.label: qst201702_0160
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: qst201702_0170
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: qst201702_0180
rows.name: Yeah! Don't act all surprised!

rows.label: qst201702_0190
rows.name:
You're saying that you think you can beat me
with one of those Divine Beast weapons, right?

rows.label: qst201702_0200
rows.name: So I'm saying I accept your challenge!

rows.label: qst201702_0210
rows.name:
No no no, come on!
That's a Superheavy-class weapon!

rows.label: qst201702_0220
rows.name: There's no way a single Blade can defeat it.

rows.label: qst201702_0230
rows.name:
He's right, Newt.
Don't you think you're being a bit...reckless?

rows.label: qst201702_0240
rows.name:
No need to worry, Rex-dono! Maybe you should
be worrying about the Divine Beast I'm about to crush!

rows.label: qst201702_0250
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst201702_0260
rows.name:
Enough talk! Make your preparations, Captain!
I'm as ready as I'll ever be!

rows.label: qst201702_0270
rows.name:
Y-you're serious?
I'm not taking responsibility if the Divine Beast pounds you into dust!

rows.label: qst201702_0280
rows.name:
Heheh. That's fine by me.
I say, bring it on! Come on, give me all you've got!

rows.label: qst201702_0290
rows.name: ...Prepare to attack.

rows.label: qst201702_0300
rows.name: Uh, sir, are you sure, sir?

rows.label: qst201702_0310
rows.name:
What? Is there a problem?
I haven't got all day!

rows.label: qst201702_0320
rows.name: W-we have no idea what could happen...

rows.label: qst201702_0330
rows.name: Come at me!

rows.label: qst201702_0340
rows.name: Not bad, eh?

rows.label: qst201702_0350
rows.name:
These Divine Beast weapons that you all value so much might be
at the core of the Superbian Imperial Army's strength...

rows.label: qst201702_0360
rows.name:
But you shouldn't be relying on them so much.
It'll just end up holding you back.

rows.label: qst201702_0370
rows.name: When we fought before, I saw it very clearly.

rows.label: qst201702_0380
rows.name:
The way you insist on relying on these weapons
is making you slack off in your training.

rows.label: qst201702_0390
rows.name:
If you don't keep improving, the rest
of the world is going to catch up to you!

rows.label: qst201702_0400
rows.name:
Indeed.
Constant improvement is essential.

rows.label: qst201702_0410
rows.name: Grand Marshal!

rows.label: qst201702_0420
rows.name:
*gasp* The Grand Marshal?
What is he doing here?

rows.label: qst201702_0430
rows.name: Who?

rows.label: qst201702_0440
rows.name:
Commander of the entire army. He reports
directly to His Majesty the Emperor.

rows.label: qst201702_0450
rows.name:
Brawling in a military facility? Unauthorized discharge
of weaponry? DESTRUCTION of a Divine Beast?!

rows.label: qst201702_0460
rows.name: These are serious infractions!

rows.label: qst201702_0470
rows.name: Ugh! Forgive me, Grand Marshal!

rows.label: qst201702_0480
rows.name: We're so sorry!

rows.label: qst201702_0490
rows.name: Permission to speak, Grand Marshal?

rows.label: qst201702_0500
rows.name:
This was due to my lapse in judgment.
There is no need to punish them.

rows.label: qst201702_0510
rows.name: I take full responsibility for what happened.

rows.label: qst201702_0520
rows.name: Meleph-dono!

rows.label: qst201702_0530
rows.name: You keep strange company these days, my lady.

rows.label: qst201702_0540
rows.name:
But respect for the free will of one's Blade is
the mark of a truly excellent Driver.

rows.label: qst201702_0550
rows.name: You honor me, Grand Marshal.

rows.label: qst201702_0560
rows.name:
However, a crime is a crime.
It wouldn't do to let this go unpunished.

rows.label: qst201702_0570
rows.name: So they must work off their debt.

rows.label: qst201702_0580
rows.name:
I order you to repair the Divine Beast Tortoga.
I want it in working order as soon as possible.

rows.label: qst201702_0590
rows.name: This is top priority.

rows.label: qst201702_0600
rows.name:
Um... Grand Marshal!
Can I offer a suggestion?

rows.label: qst201702_0610
rows.name: Speak.

rows.label: qst201702_0620
rows.name:
Everything that happened today...
It was all my fault.

rows.label: qst201702_0630
rows.name:
The responsibility for repairing
the Divine Beast should fall on me alone.

rows.label: qst201702_0640
rows.name:
Oh, I wonder...
What say you, Meleph-sama?

rows.label: qst201702_0650
rows.name:
If it pleases the Grand Marshal.
We will lend assistance if necessary.

rows.label: qst201702_0660
rows.name:
Very well.
Then, to work!

rows.label: qst201702_0670
rows.name: Hup!

rows.label: qst201702_0680
rows.name:
Yessir, Grand Marshal, sir!
I'll get to work fixing Tortoga immediately!

rows.label: qst201702_0690
rows.name: If you'll excuse me...
